name: fortinet-fortivoice
label: Fortinet FortiVoice
description: FortiVoice Secure Unified Communications, along with FortiFone IP phones, helps organizations keep up with changing communication needs due to evolving infrastructure, remote/hybrid work, and BYOD.

fields.title: Server URL
fields.name: host
fields.tooltip: URL of the Fortinet FortiVoice server to which you will connect and perform automated operations.
fields.description: URL of the Fortinet FortiVoice server to which you will connect and perform automated operations.

fields.title: Username
fields.name: username
fields.tooltip: Username of the Fortinet FortiVoice server to which you will connect and perform automated operations.
fields.description: Username of the Fortinet FortiVoice server to which you will connect and perform automated operations.

fields.title: Password
fields.name: password
fields.tooltip: Password used to access the Fortinet FortiVoice server to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.
fields.description: Password used to access the Fortinet FortiVoice server to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.name: verify_ssl
fields.tooltip: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not.By default, this option is set as True.
fields.description: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not.By default, this option is set as True.

operations.title: Get Devices List
operations.description: Retrieve authorized devices from Fortinet FortiVoice based on input parameters specified.

parameters.title: Mac Address Pattern
parameters.name: search_mac_address
parameters.tooltip: Specify the pattern to retrieve device matching(consisting) that pattern from Fortinet FortiVoice.
parameters.description: Specify the pattern to retrieve device matching(consisting) that pattern from Fortinet FortiVoice. For example, ff

parameters.title: Get Unassigned Devices
parameters.name: get_non_assigned_devices
parameters.tooltip: Set it to true to retrieve unassigned devices only. By default it is set to false.
parameters.description: Set it to true to retrieve unassigned devices only. By default it is set to false.

parameters.title: Start Index
parameters.name: start_index
parameters.tooltip: Specify the start index of devices you want to retrieve from Fortinet FortiVoice.
parameters.description: Specify the start index of devices you want to retrieve from Fortinet FortiVoice. By default it is set as 0.

parameters.title: Size
parameters.name: size
parameters.tooltip: Specify the page size of devices list you want to retrieve from Fortinet FortiVoice.
parameters.description: Specify the page size of devices list you want to retrieve from Fortinet FortiVoice. By default it is set as 50.

operations.title: Upload License File
operations.description: Uploads license file to Fortinet FortiVoice.

parameters.title: Upload File
parameters.name: upload_file
parameters.tooltip: Select license file you want to upload to FortiVoice.
parameters.description: Select license file you want to upload to FortiVoice.

operations.title: Apply The Uploaded License File
operations.description: Apply the uploaded license file to Fortinet FortiVoice.

parameters.title: Uploaded File ID
parameters.name: file_id
parameters.tooltip: Specify uploaded license file ID to apply to vm. You can get this ID from 'Upload License File' action.
parameters.description: Specify uploaded license file ID to apply to vm. You can get this ID from 'Upload License File' action.
